transportAdvice: Willemstad's historic Punda and Otrobanda districts are walkable, but reaching beaches and attractions outside the city center generally requires a taxi or rental car, as the public bus network has limited coverage of tourist areas. Taxis are widely available but unmetered, so agreeing on a fare before departure is advisable.

weather.description: Dry and breezy with plenty of sunshine, making it one of the most pleasant months to visit.
